name: Doctor Who - Amy&Eleven Dashboard for Tumblr

additional_info:
You can change the colors (background color, right bar, etc) if you want.

Just replace this in the code: e1a03b with the color you want.

And this: f8c679 for the "Add and remove" & "Explore more tags".
